name: Golf
description:
This new version of the 1990 Game Boy classic brings you 32 holes of realistic golf action with hazards that change every time you play.

Each hole has tricky hazards, so strategy is a must. Read the wind direction, check the distance, select a club, adjust your swing and keep your eye on the ball. Then, drive it home. A scorecard will keep track of your points for each hole.

From twisting fairways and hungry sandtraps to big water hazards and deceptive greens, Golf is packed with challenges.

This game is only playable in 2D.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS.
